ProgramSrvcAccomplishmentGrp.DescriptionProgramSrvcAccomTxt: JAIL MINISTRY TO INCLUDE SHEPHERDS HOUSE/SOBER LIVING, TRANSITIONAL HOME FOR WOMEN. 20 WOMEN SERVED THRU JAIL MINISTRY 15 WOMEN SERVED AT SHEPHERDS HOUSE JAIL MINISTRY: THIS PROGRAM IS AN ARM OF HEART AND PROVIDES AID FOR WOMEN BEING RELEASED FROM DETENTION WHO HAVE CONTACTED THE JAIL MINISTRY. THEY ARE PROVIDED COUNSELING AND MEDIA IN THE FORM OF RELIGIOUS MATERIALS AND VARIOUS RESOURCES AVAILABLE IN THEIR COMMUNITY TO INCLUDE SMALL GROUPS THAT THEY CAN ATTEND. OCCASIONALLY, THERE IS A NEED FOR BENEVOLENCE IN THE FORM OF PAYING FOR PRESCRIPTION MEDICATION, GAS MONEY, OR UTILITY ASSISTANCE. CHURCH SERVICES ARE ALSO PROVIDED AT THE JAIL FOR ANYONE WISHING TO ATTEND. THESE SERVICES ARE OVERSEEN BY A LICENSED ADDICTION COUNCELOR. IN FEBRUARY 2013, A SOBER LIVING/TRANSITIONAL HOME WAS STARTED TO BENEFIT SOME OF THESE WOMEN. A MORE DETAILED EXPLANATION CAN BE FOUND IN EXPLANATION PART V, LINE 33.

LAW ENFOREMENT OUTREACH GLOCK DAY 2 DAY EVENT 250 SERVED CRITICAL INCIDENT STRESS TRAINING 3 TRAINIG SESSIONS 30 SERVED HOLIDAY OUTREACH TO 1ST RESPONDERS & ON DUTY LAW ENFORCEMENT 50 SERVED LAW ENFORCEMENT OUTREACH TO INCLUDE 1ST RESPONDERS: THIS PROGRAM SERVICE IS THE MAIN THRUST OF HEART MINISTRIES AND AIMS TO PROVIDE PROGRAMS AND EVENTS THAT PROMOTE COOPERATION AND CAMARADERIE AMONGST THE LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES WITH THE STATE OF MONTANA. WE PROVIDE CRITICAL INCIDENT DEBRIEFINGS, GENERALLY DONE AS THE NEED ARISES. WE ATTEND ALL SUICIDE CALLS, AND AS A SERVICE TO THE OFFICER, FOLLOW UP WITH THE FAMILIES AND FRIENDS. THIS FOLLOW UP SOMETIMES LASTS FOR MONTHS. WE ALSO HOSTED A BREAKFAST AND LUNCH BAR WHEN THE RAVALLI COUNTY SHERIFF OFFICE SPONSORED 3 SEPARATE CRITICAL INCIDENT TRAINING EVENTS WHICH WERE OPEN TO LAW ENFORCEMENT AND THE MENTAL HEALTH COMMUNITY. FOR OUR SWORN OFFICERS WE HOST A 2 DAY EVENT CALLED GLOCK DAY. THIS ALLOWS ALL OFFICERS TO HAVE THEIR EQUIPMENT INSPECTED AND REPAIRED BY PROFESSIONALS AT NO CHARGE. IT ALSO PROVIDES AN OOPPORTUNITY TO PURCHASE THEIR GEAR AND UNIFORMS AT A REDUCED PRICE BY THE VENDORS WHO COME TO THE EVENT. WE ALSO HOST A SHOOTING MATCH FOR THE SWORN OFFICERS WITH AWARDS GIVEN TO THE WINNING AGENCY. WE PROVIDE A FIREARMS SAFETY & INSTRUCTION CLASS FOR THE WOMEN WHO ATTEND. WE HOST A BBQ BOTH DAYS OF THE EVENT. THIS EVENT SERVED 250 PEOPLE THIS YEAR. THIS HAS ALWAYS BEEN A FREE EVENT FOR THE PARTICIPANTS.

IN FE BRUARY OF 2013, THE JAIL MINISTRY, AN ARM OF HEART MINISTRIES WAS PRESENTED WITH THE OPPORTUNITY TO START A SOBER LIVING/TRANSISTIONAL HOME FOR WOMEN. THIS PROVIDES A RESOURCE THAT DID NOT EXIST IN THE BITTERROOT BALLEY UNTIL NOW. THE CLOSES FACILITY IS 50 MILES AWAY IN MISSOULA. THIS 3 STORY HOME CAN HOUSE UP TO 15 WOMEN. WE HAVE A LICENSED ADDICTION COUNSELOR, AND SEVERAL OTHER COUNSELORS DOING THEIR PRACTICUM AT THE FACILITY, AND THEY HELP WITH GROUP SESSIONS AND BIBLE STUDIES ETC. THE RESIDENT MUST BE SOBER AT LEAST 90 DAYS BEFORE ENTRY AS WE ARE NOT A TREATMENT FACITIY AND DO NOT DO DETOX. WE HAVE 2 HOUSE MOMS, SO THERE IS SOMEONE ON DUTY AT ALL TIMES. TO DATE, WE HAVE SERVED SOME 5 WOMEN, AND CURRENTLY HAVE 5 WOMEN LIVING IN THE HOUSE. THREE OF THESE WOMEN CAME FROM DETENTION AND THE OTHER 2 HAD MAJOR LIFE EVENTS THAT MADE THEM TEMPORARILY HOMELESS. AS WE NOW HAVE THE EXPENSE OF A LEASE, UTILITIES, SALARY, ETC., EACH RESIDENT IS EXPECTED TO PAY AN APPLICATION FEE (250), HER 1ST MONTH RENT (400) AND AFTER OBTAINING EMPLOYMENT, RENT IS 600. MOST OF THE WOMEN SOLICIT SPONSORSHIPS FROM AREA CHURCHES OR INDIVIDUALS INTERESTED IN THEIR RECOVERY. WE DO FUNDRAISING ALSO TO PAY EXPENSES. OUR AIM IS FOR THE SHEPHERDS HOUSE TO BE A BEACON IN OUR VALLEY, A SAFE PLACE TO RECOVER FOR THE WOMEN, AND PROVIDE TOOLS SO THAT THEY CAN LIVE A BEAUTIFUL LIFE AND BE FUNCTIONING MEMBERS OF OUR COMMUNITY. THE SHEPARDS HOUSE IS A FAITH BASED PROGRAM, OVERSEEN BY CHRISTIAN CHAPLAINS, AND THE BOARD OF HEART. THERE IS A STEERING COMMITTEE OF LIKE-MINDED WOMEN WHO PLAN AND DIRECT THE VISION FOR THE SHEPHERDS HOUSE AND HAVE INPUT ON THE DAILY SCHEDULE AND ACTIVITIES. THE ONLY PERSON COMPENSATED IS THE SENIOUR HOUSE MOM. EVERYONE ELSE, INCLUDING THE ADDICTION COUNSELOR, IS VOLUNTEERING THEIR TIME TO MAKE THIS A SUCCESS. ONCE WE HAVE ENOUGH FUNDING, THE LICENSED ADDICTION COUNSELOR AND THE ADMINISTRATOR WILL BE COMPENSTAED.
